message.content:
cs.IR, cs.DL, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG. 

The paper discusses a novel pipeline for multi-label semantic-based tagging in open-access metadata digital libraries. This involves learning from a standard scientific categorization and a sample of topic tagged articles to find semantically relevant articles and enrich its metadata accordingly. The paper focuses on improving information retrieval in scientific digital libraries, which is a common topic in the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and Digital Libraries (cs.DL) sub-categories. The use of semantic-based tagging and machine learning techniques also suggests a connection to Natural Language Processing (cs.CL), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), and Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-categories.
